response.answer_text: No. Critical theory is not one thing. The term “critical theory” refers to a number of diverse approaches in the social sciences, all of which have a critical approach to understanding questions of how power is organized and structured in modern societies. Most schools of critical theory are anti-racist and attempt to analyze and deconstruct the causes that give rise to racism, mostly with the intention of combating it.
